Class MasterActor

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor, DeepLearningConfigurable, ComputableMaster<UpdateableSingleImpl>

    public class MasterActor
extends MasterActor<UpdateableSingleImpl>
    Handles a set of workers and acts as a parameter server for iterative reduce
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
